item.title: First Log Entry
item.description: The first log entry for the game Soldier-Run

item.title: Day 2: HTML & CSS
item.description: Today I am going to be working on the HTML & CSS part of the game.
item.title: Day 3: CSS & JS
item.description: Today I am going to be working on the CSS & JS part of the game. This is one of the most important parts, because everyone likes good styling and also JavaScript makes the game.
